mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP111Mapper.CSPDCP111EReportSelect */
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR||'-'||F_CODE_NM('1000740',A.REQ_DVSN_CD)||'-'||A.RM_CVPT_ACP_NO AS ACP_NO ,TO_CHAR(A.ACP_DH,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ACP_DH ,DECODE(A.REQR_KND_CD,'1',A.CVPTR_NM,'2',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'3',A.RPST_PEN_NM,'4',A.CVPTR_NM) AS CVPTR_NM ,CASE WHEN A.ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0100' THEN '감사원 종합상담실' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0200' THEN '국민제안감사2국2과' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0205' THEN '국민제안감사2국2과 수원센터' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0300' THEN '국민제안감사2국3과' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0315' THEN '국민제안감사2국2과 부산센터' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0325' THEN '국민제안감사2국2과 대구센터' WHEN A.RAL_ACP_DPT_CD = '0L0335' THEN '국민제안감사2국2과 광주센터' ELSE ( SELECT S1.DPT_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = A.ACP_DPT_CD ) END AS ACP_DPT_NM ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.HNDL_DDLN_DT),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HNDL_LIMIT_DT_PRCS ,A.TIT_NM FROM TBCSPDCP101M A WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo}
mapper.insert:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP111Mapper.CSPDCP111ESMGInsert */
INSERT INTO T_IC_TARGET_SRC_INTERFACE ( INTERFACE_KEY ,APP_ORGAN_CODE /*최초 민원 신청 기관코드(GCC)*/ ,PETI_NO /*민원신청번호*/ ,REC_SEQ /*분류이력일련번호*/ ,CIVIL_NO /*민원접수번호*/ ,PETI_GUBUN /*민원구분 (500고정,담당자부서지정) */ ,CANCEL_STATUS /*민원취하여부(Default N)*/ ,PCD_DEPT /*GCC 부서코드 (접수부서코드)*/ ,PCD_DEPT_NM /*GCC 부서명 (접수부서명)*/ ,PCD_DUTY_ID /*접수자명*/ ,PCD_EMAIL /*접수 이메일 (대표이메일 사용, 감청국, 센터 로 분류)*/ ,PCD_TEL /*접수자 전화번호 (대표전화 사용: 감청국, 센터로 분류)*/ ,PCD_ORGAN_CODE /*실처리기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,SRCORGCD /*소스기관코드 (감사원 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,TGTORGCD /*타겟기관코드 (신문고 GCC 코드로 고정)*/ ,WRITE_TIME /*등록일자*/ ,SND_RCV_GUBUN /*송수신구분 (1:송신, 2:수신)*/ ,SND_RCV_TIME /*송수신일자*/ ,SEND_YN /*송신여부 (N DEFAULT, EAI 가 송신후 Y로 변경함)*/ ,PETI_END /*처리기한*/ ,ORGAN_REG_DATE /*접수일*/ ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF2') || LPAD(ROUND(DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(1, 999999999)), 9, '0') ,#{smgFrtCvptAplGccOrgCd} ,#{smgCvptAplNo} ,#{smgCatHstSrno} ,#{smgCvptAcpNo} ,'500' ,'N' ,( SELECT SUBSTR(STND_DPT_CD,9,7) FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = #{fnlDealDptCd} ) ,( SELECT S2.ALL_ORG_NM FROM TBDCMACM002M S1 ,TBCSPIIT006M S2 WHERE S1.DPT_CD = #{fnlDealDptCd} AND S2.GCC_ORG_CD = SUBSTR(S1.STND_DPT_CD,9,7) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,F_USR_INFO(#{sCnb},'2') ,'' ,'02-2011-2191' ,'1040000' ,'1040000' ,'1140100' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) ,'1' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') ,'N' ,TO_DATE(F_GET_NEXT_WORK_DT(REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(#{acpDh},0,10),'[^[:digit:]]'),30),'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:MI:SS') +1 -1/(24*60*60) ,( SELECT SUBSTR(REGEXP_REPLACE(S1.ACP_DH,'[^[:digit:]]'),0,14) FROM TBCSPDCP101M S1 WHERE S1.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND S1.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND S1.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo} AND ROWNUM = 1 ) )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP111Mapper.CSPDCP111EMsgInsert */
INSERT INTO MSG_DATA ( MSG_SEQ , CUR_STATE , REQ_DATE , CALL_TO , CALL_FROM , SMS_TXT , MSG_TYPE , CONT_SEQ , USERDATA ) VALUES ( MSG_DATA_SEQ.NEXTVAL , 0 , SYSDATE , REPLACE(#{hpn},'-','') , NVL(( SELECT S1.USR_DFN_TXT_1 FROM TBDCMACM013C S1 WHERE S1.CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = '1000144' AND S1.CD = #{ralAcpDptCd} ) ,'02-2011-2191') , '' , 6 , #{contSeq} , #{reqDvsnCd}||#{acpYr}||#{cvptAcpNo} )
mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.csp.dcp.dao.CSPDCP111Mapper.selectComCdList */
SELECT CD , CD_NM , USR_DFN_TXT_1 , USR_DFN_TXT_2 , USR_DFN_TXT_3 , USR_DFN_TXT_4 , USR_DFN_TXT_5 FROM TBDCMACM013C WHERE CMM_CD_DVSN_CD = #{cmmCdDvsnCd} AND CD <> '000000000' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY OTPT_SEQ
